OOC: I hope this is fair I never seen it done so I guess to a new move.

::Inu-Yasha::
Gets hit by the base defense and falls skidding Knocking over a few 
trees.Inu's Chest hurts and he looks at the dings Lifts his head "Ouch" 
Stands and starts gather trees making a defense area.

::Koj::
Koj sees WarMachine lasers disconnects the Fang and holding it in a X trying 
to absorb the blast as the from Warmachine as the fang drinks most of it as 
the rest hits Koj knocking him out of the tree. Koj falling pretty fast 
flips to land on his feet. Sees the blast from Zardus and Bloodystrike 
comeing head on.

::Inu::
Stacking the trees as fast as possible.

::Koj::
Koj starts fliping backwards and sticks the halfs of the tekno Lance in two 
trees swings up to stand on them allowing the shoots to go under him. As the 
Two missile from someone close in.

::Inu-Yasha::
Fires 2 lancers at the twin missiles causing to explode knocking Koj behind 
the wall."Koj get down here!"

::Koj::
Landing with a Thud "Thanks" Uses his chains to stabilize the wall of trees.

::Inu::
"Whats the plan?" Inu breaths his Ice breath at the back of the trees to 
reinforce it."We got to boost our sink ratio to use Kasier"

::Koj::
I thought you had one? Peeks around the side looks at the Giant Ice spikes 
on the wall and the Alliance members between them and the ship. "Heres the 
plan" Removes the the bracelet "I know the music this is to build your sink 
ratio fight with it and the Plan." Koj Picks up this side or the wall.

::Inu::
Inu grabs his side of the wall "Works for me." rolls out all 6 of his 
thrusters.

::Both::
Both Fire off there Thruster moving the wall with a great speed getting 
pretty close to the Alliance members at the same time both let go and flip 
kicking the wall at the Alliance members. Both Flip to there feet.
